57 template <typename Perm, typename Arg, typename Result>
58 inline void permute_array(const Perm& perm, const Arg& arg, Result& result) {
59  TA_ASSERT(result.size() == arg.size());
60  if (perm.domain_size() < arg.size()) {
61  std::copy(arg.begin(), arg.end(),
62  result.begin()); // if perm does not map every element of arg,
63  // copy arg to result first
64  }
65  for (const auto& p : perm.data()) {
66  TA_ASSERT(result.size() > p.second);
67  TA_ASSERT(arg.size() > p.second);
68  result[p.second] = arg[p.first];
69  }
70 }
71 } // namespace detail
72 
74 
141 class Permutation {
142  public:
143  typedef Permutation Permutation_;
144  typedef unsigned int index_type;
145  typedef std::map<index_type, index_type> Map;
146  typedef Map::const_iterator const_iterator;
147 
148  private:
150  Map p_;
151 
152  static std::ostream& print_map(std::ostream& output, const Map& p) {
153  for (auto i = p.cbegin(); i != p.cend();) {
154  output << i->first << "->" << i->second;
155  if (++i != p.cend()) output << ", ";
156  }
157  return output;
158  }
159  friend inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& output,
160  const Permutation& p);
161 
165  template <typename InIter>
166  static bool valid_permutation(InIter first, InIter last) {
167  bool result = true;
168  for (; first != last; ++first) {
169  const auto value = *first;
170  result = result && value >= 0 && (std::count(first, last, *first) == 1ul);
171  }
172  return result;
173  }
174 
178  template <typename Map>
179  static bool valid_permutation(const Map& input) {
180  std::set<index_type> keys;
181  std::set<index_type> values;
182  for (const auto& e : input) {
183  const auto& key = e.first;
184  const auto& value = e.second;
185  if (keys.find(key) == keys.end())
186  keys.insert(key);
187  else {
188  // print_map(std::cout, input);
189  return false; // key is found more than once
190  }
191  if (values.find(value) == values.end())
192  values.insert(value);
193  else {
194  // print_map(std::cout, input);
195  return false; // value is found more than once
196  }
197  }
198  return keys == values; // must map domain into itself
199  }
200 
201  // Used to select the correct constructor based on input template types
202  struct Enabler {};
203 
204  public:
205  Permutation() = default; // makes an identity permutation
206  Permutation(const Permutation&) = default;
207  Permutation(Permutation&&) = default;
208  ~Permutation() = default;
209  Permutation& operator=(const Permutation&) = default;
210  Permutation& operator=(Permutation&& other) = default;
211 
213 
219  template <typename InIter,
220  typename std::enable_if<TiledArray::detail::is_input_iterator<
221  InIter>::value>::type* = nullptr>
222  Permutation(InIter first, InIter last) {
223  TA_ASSERT(valid_permutation(first, last));
224  size_t i = 0;
225  for (auto e = first; e != last; ++e, ++i) {
226  auto p_i = *e;
227  if (i != p_i) p_[i] = p_i;
228  }
229  }
230

235  explicit Permutation(const std::vector<index_type>& a)
236  : Permutation(a.begin(), a.end()) {}
237 
239 
241  explicit Permutation(std::initializer_list<index_type> list)
242  : Permutation(list.begin(), list.end()) {}
243 
245 
247  Permutation(Map p) : p_(std::move(p)) { TA_ASSERT(valid_permutation(p_)); }

252  unsigned int domain_size() const { return p_.size(); }

277

281  const_iterator cend() const { return p_.cend(); }

284 
286 
290  index_type operator[](index_type e) const {
291  auto e_image_iter = p_.find(e);
292  if (e_image_iter != p_.end())
293  return e_image_iter->second;
294  else
295  return e;
296  }
297 
299 
302  template <typename Set>
303  Set domain() const {
304  Set result;
305  for (const auto& e : this->p_) {
306  result.insert(result.begin(), e.first);
307  }
308  // std::sort(result.begin(), result.end());
309  return result;
310  }
311 
313 
317  template <typename Integer,
318  typename std::enable_if<std::is_integral<Integer>::value>::type* =
319  nullptr>
320  bool is_in_domain(Integer i) const {
321  return p_.find(i) != p_.end();
322  }
323 
325 
337  std::vector<std::vector<index_type>> cycles() const {
338  std::vector<std::vector<index_type>> result;
339 
340  std::set<index_type> placed_in_cycle;
341 
342  // safe to use non-const operator[] due to properties of Permutation
343  // (domain==image)
344  auto& p_nonconst_ = const_cast<Map&>(p_);
345 
346  // 1. for each i compute its orbit
347  // 2. if the orbit is longer than 1, sort and add to the list of cycles
348  for (const auto& e : p_) {
349  auto i = e.first;
350  if (placed_in_cycle.find(i) ==
351  placed_in_cycle.end()) { // not in a cycle yet?
352  std::vector<index_type> cycle(1, i);
353  placed_in_cycle.insert(i);
354 
355  index_type next_i = p_nonconst_[i];
356  while (next_i != i) {
357  cycle.push_back(next_i);
358  placed_in_cycle.insert(next_i);
359  next_i = p_nonconst_[next_i];
360  }
361 
362  if (cycle.size() != 1) {
363  std::sort(cycle.begin(), cycle.end());
364  result.emplace_back(cycle);
365  }
366 
367  } // this i already in a cycle
368  } // loop over i
369 
370  return result;
371  }
372 
374 
377  Permutation mult(const Permutation& other) const {
378  // 1. domain of product = domain of this U domain of other
379  using iset = std::set<index_type>;
380  auto product_domain = this->domain<iset>();
381  auto other_domain = other.domain<iset>();
382  product_domain.insert(other_domain.begin(), other_domain.end());
383 
384  Map result;
385  for (const auto& d : product_domain) {
386  const auto d_image = other[(*this)[d]];
387  if (d_image != d) result[d] = d_image;
388  }
389 
390  return Permutation(result);
391  }
392 
394 
398  Permutation inv() const {
399  Map result;
400  for (const auto& iter : p_) {
401  const auto i = iter.first;
402  const auto pi = iter.second;
403  result.insert(std::make_pair(pi, i));
404  }
405  return Permutation(std::move(result));
406  }
407 
409 
414  Permutation pow(int n) const {
415  // Initialize the algorithm inputs
416  int power;
417  Permutation value;
418  if (n < 0) {
419  value = inv();
420  power = -n;
421  } else {
422  value = *this;
423  power = n;
424  }
425 
426  Permutation result;
427 
428  while (power) {
429  if (power & 1) result = result.mult(value);
430  value = value.mult(value);
431  power >>= 1;
432  }
433 
434  return result;
435  }
436 
438 
442  const Map& data() const { return p_; }
443 
445 
447  Permutation identity() const { return Permutation(); }
448 
450 
454  template <typename Archive>
455  void serialize(Archive& ar) {
456  ar& p_;
457  }
458 
459 }; // class Permutation

462 
467 inline bool operator==(const Permutation& p1, const Permutation& p2) {
468  return (p1.domain_size() == p2.domain_size()) && p1.data() == p2.data();
469 }
470 
472 
477 inline bool operator!=(const Permutation& p1, const Permutation& p2) {
478  return !operator==(p1, p2);
479 }
480 
482 
487 inline bool operator<(const Permutation& p1, const Permutation& p2) {
488  if (&p1 == &p2) return false;
489  return std::lexicographical_compare(p1.data().begin(), p1.data().end(),
490  p2.data().begin(), p2.data().end());
491 }

498 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& output, const Permutation& p) {
499  output << "{";
500  Permutation::print_map(output, p.data());
501  output << "}";
502  return output;
503 }

509 inline Permutation operator-(const Permutation& perm) { return perm.inv(); }
510 
512 
517 inline Permutation operator*(const Permutation& p1, const Permutation& p2) {
518  return p1.mult(p2);
519 }
520 
522 inline Permutation& operator*=(Permutation& p1, const Permutation& p2) {
523  return (p1 = p1 * p2);
524 }
525 
527 
533 inline Permutation operator^(const Permutation& perm, int n) {
534  return perm.pow(n);
535 }

539 
548 template <typename T, std::size_t N>
549 inline std::array<T, N> operator*(const Permutation& perm,
550  const std::array<T, N>& a) {
551  std::array<T, N> result;
552  symmetry::detail::permute_array(perm, a, result);
553  return result;
554 }
555 
557 
565 template <typename T, std::size_t N>
566 inline std::array<T, N>& operator*=(std::array<T, N>& a,
567  const Permutation& perm) {
568  const std::array<T, N> temp = a;
569  symmetry::detail::permute_array(perm, temp, a);
570  return a;
571 }

574 
582 template <typename T, typename A>
583 inline std::vector<T> operator*(const Permutation& perm,
584  const std::vector<T, A>& v) {
585  std::vector<T> result(v.size());
586  symmetry::detail::permute_array(perm, v, result);
587  return result;
588 }
589 
591 
599 template <typename T, typename A>
600 inline std::vector<T, A>& operator*=(std::vector<T, A>& v,
601  const Permutation& perm) {
602  const std::vector<T, A> temp = v;
603  symmetry::detail::permute_array(perm, temp, v);
604  return v;
605 }
